title: 30 Pieces Screens Glass Stainless Steel Concave Screens 0.31 Inch/ 8 mm Small Filter Curved Filter
features: "What you will get: you will get 30 pieces of concave screens, enough to meet your needs for use and replacement, also allows you to share with your family, friends, coworkers, neighbors, etc."
"Material: these small screens are made of stainless steel, sturdy and durable, coming with resistance to high temperature, rust. corrosion, which can be kept for a long time"

"Size: each stainless steel screen filter measures 0.31 inches/ 8 mm, compact and lightweight, making it convenient for you to carry wherever you need; They won't take up too much room and easy to store in your pocket, backpack, shelf, cabinet and so on"
"Easy to use: the curved filter will not bend or break even under high temperature; Stainless steel material also make them reusable and washable"
"Easy to clean: the durable concave screens are easy to clean, you can quickly clean them by dredging with a pin, which really saves your time and effort"
